title: Bitdefender GravityZone Link Following Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Bitdefender GravityZone. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Endpoint Agent. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the service to overwrite a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: Bitdefender has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.bitdefender.com/support/security-advisories/improper-link-resolution-before-file-access-in-bitdefender-endpoint-security-tools-for-windows-va-9921/
timeline:
2021-07-09 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-01-27 - Coordinated public release of advisory
